instructions: निम्न प्रश्नहरुको उत्तर Section अनुसार छुट्टाई उत्तरपुस्तिकामा लेख्नुपर्नेछ।
कुनै पनि प्रश्नको उत्तर उत्तरपुस्तिकामा नलेखिएमा उत्तरपुस्तिका रद्द हुनेछ।
प्रत्येक प्रश्नको उत्तर दिनु अघि प्रश्न नम्बर स्पष्ट रूपमा लेख्नुपर्नेछ।
सबै प्रश्नहरुको उत्तर नेपाली वा अंग्रेजी भाषामा लेख्न सकिन्छ।

questions.question: What are the main risks involved in bridge construction? Explain the safety measures to be adopted during different stages of bridge construction.

Distinguish between the 'Initial Load Test' and the 'Routine Load Test' for piles. Using the load-settlement curve, explain the 'Cyclic Load Test' method used to separate the skin friction from the end bearing component.

Discuss the salient features of Kennedy's Theory for the design of earth channels based on the critical velocity concept and mention its limitations?

A trapezoidal channel with side slope 1:1.5 is to carry 15 m³/s of water. The channel has a bed slope of 1 in 2000 and Manning's roughness coefficient of 0.015. Determine the dimensions of the channel for most economical section.
